item.title: Weinstein opposes opening fire against stone throwers despite PM claims
item.description: A-G Yehuda Weinstein announced at a special hearing that he opposed the motion to open fire at stone throwers, despite the PM's Office's statement that the draft was presented with his consent.
item.Author: By DANA SOMBERG/MAARIV HASHAVUA

item.title: Anglo community memorializes victims of Har Nof massacre, Chaya Zissel Braun
item.description: The ceremony, arranged by the Association of Americans and Canadians in Israel (AACI), took place at Shaar Hagai JNF Memorial Forest.
item.Author: By DANIEL K. EISENBUD

item.title: Former Supreme Court Justice Mishael Cheshin laid to rest
item.description: Cheshin was known as somewhat more conservative than former Supreme Court president Aharon Barak, though not all of his decisions could be easily categorized as liberal or conservative.
item.Author: By YONAH JEREMY BOB,GREER FAY CASHMAN
